snippet: Roberto Di Matteo was hired Friday by Aston Villa, ensuring there will be two Champions League-winning managers in English soccer's second tier next season after Rafa Benitez opted to stay at Newcastle....

headline.main: Villa Hires Roberto Di Matteo as Manager
headline.print_headline: Villa Hires Roberto Di Matteo as Manager

lead_paragraph: Roberto Di Matteo was hired Friday by Aston Villa, ensuring there will be two Champions League-winning managers in English soccer's second tier next season after Rafa Benitez opted to stay at Newcastle.

snippet: Sunderland have extended the contract of Jermain Defoe to 2019 after the striker helped the Premier League club avoid the drop....

headline.main: Defoe Extends Contract at Sunderland to 2019
headline.print_headline: Defoe Extends Contract at Sunderland to 2019

lead_paragraph: Sunderland have extended the contract of Jermain Defoe to 2019 after the striker helped the Premier League club avoid the drop.

snippet: Bournemouth defender Adam Smith has signed a new four-year deal that will keep him at the Premier League club until 2020....

headline.main: Smith Signs Four-Year Deal With Bournemouth
headline.print_headline: Smith Signs Four-Year Deal With Bournemouth

lead_paragraph: Bournemouth defender Adam Smith has signed a new four-year deal that will keep him at the Premier League club until 2020.

snippet: Aston Villa have signed defender Ritchie De Laet from Premier League champions Leicester City on a three-year contract....

headline.main: Aston Villa Sign Belgian Defender De Laet From Leicester
headline.print_headline: Aston Villa Sign Belgian Defender De Laet From Leicester

lead_paragraph: Aston Villa have signed defender Ritchie De Laet from Premier League champions Leicester City on a three-year contract.

snippet: Holders and Premier League leaders Arsenal will be at home to Championship (second tier) Burnley in the fourth round of the FA Cup after most of the big guns avoided top flight opponents in Monday's draw....

headline.main: Holders Arsenal Draw Burnley in FA Cup Fourth Round
headline.print_headline: Holders Arsenal Draw Burnley in FA Cup Fourth Round

lead_paragraph: Holders and Premier League leaders Arsenal will be at home to Championship (second tier) Burnley in the fourth round of the FA Cup after most of the big guns avoided top flight opponents in Monday's draw.

snippet: Zlatan Ibrahimovic is on the brink of another notable scoring landmark in his remarkable career and believes his goal glut can still propel Manchester United to the Premier League title....

headline.main: Record-Seeking Zlatan Believes United Can Still Win Title
headline.print_headline: Record-Seeking Zlatan Believes United Can Still Win Title

lead_paragraph: Zlatan Ibrahimovic is on the brink of another notable scoring landmark in his remarkable career and believes his goal glut can still propel Manchester United to the Premier League title.

snippet: Manchester United will begin their FA Cup defence at home to a Reading side managed by their former defender Jaap Stam, while their local rivals Manchester City visit West Ham United in the third round after the draw was made on Monday....

headline.main: Holders United Host Reading, City Visit West Ham in FA Cup
headline.print_headline: Holders United Host Reading, City Visit West Ham in FA Cup

lead_paragraph: Manchester United will begin their FA Cup defence at home to a Reading side managed by their former defender Jaap Stam, while their local rivals Manchester City visit West Ham United in the third round after the draw was made on Monday.

snippet: Tottenham Hotspur may need to find different ways to unlock the defences if they are to reignite their Premier League title bid, manager Mauricio Pochettino said on Tuesday....

headline.main: Spurs May Need to Alter Style to Halt Slump-Pochettino
headline.print_headline: Spurs May Need to Alter Style to Halt Slump-Pochettino

lead_paragraph: Tottenham Hotspur may need to find different ways to unlock the defences if they are to reignite their Premier League title bid, manager Mauricio Pochettino said on Tuesday.

snippet: Hull City will need to quickly adapt to their new 3-5-2 formation if they are to drag themselves out of the Premier League relegation battle, manager Mike Phelan said, ahead of Friday's clash against seventh-placed Everton....

headline.main: Phelan Hopes Hull Make Most of New Formation
headline.print_headline: Phelan Hopes Hull Make Most of New Formation

lead_paragraph: Hull City will need to quickly adapt to their new 3-5-2 formation if they are to drag themselves out of the Premier League relegation battle, manager Mike Phelan said, ahead of Friday's clash against seventh-placed Everton.

snippet: - The Brazilian Football Confederation (CBF) has announced a benefit game between Brazil and Colombia on Jan. 25, the same day Chapecoense play their first game since the air crash that prompted the friendly....

headline.main: Brazil to Meet Colombia in Chapecoense Benefit Game
headline.print_headline: Brazil to Meet Colombia in Chapecoense Benefit Game

lead_paragraph: - The Brazilian Football Confederation (CBF) has announced a benefit game between Brazil and Colombia on Jan. 25, the same day Chapecoense play their first game since the air crash that prompted the friendly.
